scripts.postinstall: POLAR_SEA_VIDEOS_URL='http://mozvr.com/projects/polarsea/content/videos/' npm run syncmedia && npm run syncmozvr
scripts.syncmedia: if ! [ -f 'public/demos/polarsea/videos/PolarSeaTrailer-3.mp4' ]; then ( mkdir -p public/demos/polarsea/videos/ && curl -o public/demos/polarsea/videos/PolarSeaTrailer-3.mp4 $POLAR_SEA_VIDEOS_URL'PolarSeaTrailer-3.mp4' ); fi; if ! [ -f 'public/demos/polarsea/videos/PolarSeaTrailer-3.webm' ]; then ( mkdir -p public/demos/polarsea/videos/ && curl -o public/demos/polarsea/videos/PolarSeaTrailer-3.webm $POLAR_SEA_VIDEOS_URL'PolarSeaTrailer-3.webm' ); fi
scripts.syncmozvr: mkdir -p public/demos/mozvr-site/ && cd node_modules/mozvr-site/ && sed -e 's/"url":.*$/"url": "\/demos\/mozvr-site",/g' config.json > config_local.json && wintersmith build -o ../../public/demos/mozvr-site/ --config config_local.json && rm -f config_local.json && cd -
